name: NavMeshFollower
author: kafeijao
description:
Simple mod that allows to control a prop nav mesh agent.

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/NavMeshFollower) for more in-depth info.
changelog:
- Fixed for 2024r175
- Prevent followers from making you seat when they're holding a prop with a seat
